holidays.description: With its biblical roots and a cute, accessible nickname, Abigail’s popularity is hardly strange.

holidays.title: Case Day
holidays.description: Case is a modern, straightforward given name that has a very interesting origin.

holidays.description: Can epidemics be stopped? Health experts certainly believe so. All that is required is preparedness.

holidays.title: National Make Cut-Out Snowflakes Day
holidays.description: We are ready with our art supplies for National Make Cut-Out Snowflakes Day.

holidays.title: St John History

holidays.title: Visit the Zoo Day
holidays.description: When was the last time you visited the zoo and connected with wild animals?

holidays.title: Amberlynn Reid’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her content keeps people glued to their screens as they anticipate her next video.

holidays.title: Bill Goldberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: What started as a career in football became a legendary run in the world of wrestling!

holidays.title: Carson Palmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Carson Palmer's remarkable career will be remembered by all N.F.L. fans.

holidays.title: Dustin Bates’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this talented musician who has worked with the International Space University.

holidays.title: Isela Sule’s Birthday

holidays.title: Timothée Chalamet’s Birthday
